function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential inconvenience and expense of daily mask cleaning and filter replacement","Impact":"Reduced compliance with mask hygiene, increased risk of contamination","Mitigation":"Education on the importance of regular cleaning and filter replacement, development of more convenient cleaning and filter replacement methods","Technologies":"Self-cleaning mask materials, reusable and washable filter materials","People":"Users of Maskfone and Airpop masks","Owner":"Manufacturers of Maskfone and Airpop masks"},{"Description":"High cost and unavailability of Airpop masks for Android users","Impact":"Limited access to advanced mask features, reduced ability to track and trace COVID-19 exposure","Mitigation":"Exploring cost-effective production methods, expanding availability to Android users","Technologies":"Cost-effective manufacturing technologies, Android-compatible software development","People":"Android users, individuals at risk of COVID-19 exposure","Owner":"Manufacturers of Airpop masks"},{"Description":"Conceptual nature of Yanko Design's smart display face shield","Impact":"Potential delay in implementation of beneficial features for medical staff and patient care","Mitigation":"Accelerating development and production timeline, investment in prototype testing and production","Technologies":"Rapid prototyping technologies, smart display development, medical communication software","People":"Medical staff, patients, developers","Owner":"Yanko Design, medical equipment manufacturers"}]}
